name: Avernum: Escape From the Pit

files.installer: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Avernum - Escape From The Pit/Avernum.exe

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
game:

  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:

    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
